Text: Dont let your Vision Benefits expire Get FREE Shipping before Dear STEVE HARRIS Its almost dont let your corporate vision benefits expire Order your contact lenses and eyeglasses now Plus get free shipping on orders of or more placed before Use offer code FLEXBEN during checkout Order from Lens Express and enjoy Exceptional savings on contact lenses eyeglasses sunglasses and more Your prescription information is verified with your doctor to ensure your eye health Order from the comfort of your own home Delivery right to your door You are provided a detailed invoice for your records Satisfaction Guaranteed Visit Lens Express using the link below to begin taking advantage of your flexible benefits Wishing you a Happy New Year The Team at Lens Express PS The Lens Express web site log in has recently changed You can use your email address and a password to log in OR your customer number combined with your home phone number During our Year history your satisfaction has always come first If you would like to be removed from future Lens Express email promotions please click the link below Please be sure to cut and past the link if it should wrap onto two lines utilitiesrequestaspcust
